making.title: How do we make our soap?

list.name: Liza
list.text: I am delighted with the custom soap! I ordered it with the image of my favorite flower and I can't get enough of the result. The soap lathers well, moisturizes the skin, and smells pleasant. Very happy with the purchase!

list.name: Maxim
list.text: Custom soap is my find of the year! I gave it to my friend with the image of her favorite animal and she was delighted. Great quality and an original gift!

list.name: Lina
